did.head: Collection Summary

origination.label: Creator
origination.persname: Anderson, Charles L. G. (Charles Loftus Grant), 1863-1952.

did.abstract: Charles L. G. Anderson, 1863-1952, was a Surgeon in the U.S. Army; 9th Infantry at Whipple Barracks and Fort McDowell, Ariz.; later at Newport News, Va. The collection contains letters, receipts, bills, orders, and other materials chiefly relating to Arizona military service. Also includes material concerning service in Virginia, and a printed copy of his address Arizona as a Health Resort. April 9, 1890, to the Washington County Medical Society, Md.
